problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following are variables in the IPAT equation? Check all that apply.<< [x] Population [] Pollution [x] Technology [x] Affluence
[explanation] The IPAT equation is as follows: (Environmental) Impact= Population x Affluence x Technology. Pollution, while certainly an aspect of environmental impact, is not a variable in itself. [explanation]
